snippet: Tom Boonen of Belgium led a sprint finish to win a windswept second stage of the Paris-Nice race, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain took the overall lead.
abstract: Belgian cyclist Tom Boonen wins second stage of the Paris-Nice race, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain takes overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Tom Boonen of Belgium led a sprint finish to win a windswept second stage of the Paris-Nice race, and Bradley Wiggins of Britain took the overall lead.
